twilightZone.title: Where Is Everybody?
twilightZone.synopsis: A man finds himself completely alone in a town that looks recently lived in.
twilightZone.review: A great start to a great show.

comments.author: Alex
comments.comment: yeah it really was so good.

twilightZone.title: One For The Angels
twilightZone.synopsis: A sidewalk salesman is visited by Death. When he refuses to go, Death decides to take a little girl at midnight instead.

comments.author: Isaac
comments.comment: Why didn't you like this one?

comments.author: Alex
comments.comment: Just a weak script, that's all

twilightZone.title: Mr. Denton on Domsday
twilightZone.synopsis: In the Old West, a quick-draw duelist is scared of a new challenger, but is offered a special potion that will make him the best shooter for 10 seconds.
twilightZone.review: Martin Landau's so good in this.

twilightZone.title: The Sixteen-Millimeter Shrine
twilightZone.synopsis: A shut-in has-been actress is obsessed with her old movies.
twilightZone.review: Can you imagine the guys who had to go ask Ida Lupino if she could play an old has-been actress?

twilightZone.title: Walking Distance
twilightZone.synopsis: A man returning to his old home town realizes that he's traveled back in time to the world of his childhood.
twilightZone.review: This episode really made me cry, it's so good.

twilightZone.title: Escape Clause
twilightZone.synopsis: A hypochondriac makes a Deal with the Devil for immortality, but becomes bored when his death-defying stunts lose their luster.
twilightZone.review: Probably the weakest episode so far, just a terrible script.

twilightZone.title: The Lonely
twilightZone.synopsis: A convict in solitary confinement on an asteroid is given a robot woman for companionship, but soon believes she's a real woman, and when he receives a pardon, has to deal with leaving her behind.
twilightZone.review: Jack Warden was such a good actor, one of the 12 Angry Men jurors
